info.name: Base_API_Tests
info.description:
This collection tests a simple internship platform application workflow where students apply, staff shortlist, and employers make final decisions on applications.

It covers:

- Authentication flows (signup, login, logout)
    
- Application lifecycle: **APPLIED → SHORTLISTED → ACCEPTED / REJECTED**
    
- Role-based access control for **student**, **staff**, and **employer**
    
- Allowed and disallowed state transitions, with clear error responses
    

The collection is organized into folders by role, and uses pre-request scripts to auto-signup + login test users so that each request can be run without manual setup.

item.description:
Endpoints that represent what a **student** can do in the system.

This folder focuses on:

- Signing up and logging in as a student
    
- Submitting an application (`student_apply`)
    
- Checking the current status of their own application (`/api/applications/my`)
    

All requests in this folder assume the caller has the **student** role and use the `student_token` provided by the pre-request script.EndFragment

All requests in this folder assume the caller has the **staff** role and use the `staff_token` from the pre-request script.

item.description:
StartFragment

This folder focuses on the employer side of the process:

- Creating position openings (`/api/openings/:id`)
    
- Listing their own openings (`/api/openings/my`)
    
- Viewing applications shortlisted to a specific opening (`/api/openings/:position_id/applications`)
    
- Making final decisions on applications (`/api/applications/:id/decision`) – moving from **SHORTLISTED → ACCEPTED/REJECTED**
    

All requests in this folder assume the caller has the **employer** role and use the `employer_token` provided by the pre-request script.  
  

EndFragment
